com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.stackmanagement

Class StackManager<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.stackmanagement.StackManager<E>

  • public class StackManager<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for managing multiple stacks. An example would be if one needed to maintain stacks of fragments for various 'paths' in an app and need to persist a managed list of each of them. Created by Patrick-SSD2 on 11/5/2017.

    • Method Detail

      • enableLogging

        public void enableLogging(boolean enable)

      • clearOneStack

        public void clearOneStack(int tag)
        Clear one stack via the tag sent. Follows the boolean rule set via constructor about maintaining 1 left in the stack if the boolean maintainMinimumOneItemInStack is set to true

      • clearAllStacks

        public void clearAllStacks()
        Clear all stacks. Follows the boolean rule set via constructor about maintaining 1 left in the stack if the boolean maintainMinimumOneItemInStack is set to true

      • appendToTheStack

        public E appendToTheStack(int tagToMatchToEnums,
                          E enumToAdd)
        Append enums to the stack
        Parameters:
        tagToMatchToEnums - Int tag to match the map in the constructor
        enumToAdd - Enum to add / append to the stack
        Returns:
        Enum Enum of the one at the top of the stack

      • appendToTheStack

        public E appendToTheStack(int tagToMatchToEnums,
                          java.util.List<E> enumsToAdd)
        Append enums to the stack
        Parameters:
        tagToMatchToEnums - Int tag to match the map in the constructor
        enumsToAdd - List of Enums to add / append to the stack
        Returns:
        Enum of the one at the top of the stack

      • popTheStack

        public E popTheStack(int tagToMatchToEnums)
        Pop the stack matching the int enum used.
        Parameters:
        tagToMatchToEnums - Int tag to match the map in the constructor
        Returns:
        Returns the enum at the top of the stack. If the stack is empty, returns null

      • popTheStack

        public E popTheStack(int tagToMatchToEnums,
                     int numToPop)
        Pop the stack matching the int enum used.
        Parameters:
        tagToMatchToEnums - Int tag to match the map in the constructor
        numToPop - Number to pop off the stack
        Returns:
        Returns the enum at the top of the stack. If the stack is empty, returns null
